name: skillset
title: Skillset
description: Adds support for skills to Raycast AI.
author: TimoBechtel

commands.name: search-skills
commands.title: Search Skills
commands.description: Search and preview your installed skills

tools.name: list-all-skills
tools.title: List All Skills
tools.description: Returns a list of installed skills. Use first to discover available capabilities.

tools.name: find-skills
tools.title: Find Skills
tools.description: Search skills by keyword/capability (e.g., 'coding', 'writing'). Use when a specific capability is implied.

tools.name: read-skill
tools.title: Read Skill Content
tools.description: Get a skill's full instructions. REQUIRED before using any skill.

tools.name: read-skill-attachment
tools.title: Read Skill Attachment
tools.description: Read supporting files (templates, examples) referenced by a skill. Expects a relative path.

preferences.name: skillsDirectory
preferences.title: Skills Directory
preferences.description: Path to your skills folder (e.g. ~/.agents/skills or ~/.cursor/skills)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
